Mini Robots 1

RoboBrain is a coding and robotics programme that is designed to educate and empower children with the understanding they need to make sense of how things work the way they do, and to future-proof them for the technology-driven road ahead. Built with creativity and logic at the very heart of it all, these courses are offered to students as an after-school class; and to educators to embed in the computing curriculum of their schools and institutions. !

Venue details

903 Johns Skyway, Paris, France

Venue details

903 Johns Skyway, Paris, France
